desc: Covert Customs began life as a small company manufacturing electrical harnesses. Since then we have moved into automotive lighting, and now all automotive accessories.

layout.text:
WE CAN'T WAIT TO BE BACK
AS WE CONTINUE TO WORK THROUGH THE UNIQUE CHALLENGES OF THE PANDEMIC, WE HAVE MADE THE CHOICE TO REVAMP OUR PRODUCT LINE AND BRING TO MARKET SOME UNIQUE PRODUCTS
IF THERE'S ANYTHING WE CAN HELP YOU WITH, REACH US AT INFO@COVERTELEC.COM
